section.name: Goto a Documenttype
section.span: How to get to a screen to manipulate a particular documenttype.

div.p: Opened the tab for the documenttype 'upcoming', which is a documenttype in the namespace 'sar'. For the documenttype, there are subtabs 'Edit' and 'Copy'. The 'upcoming' documenttype is already filled by a structure definition containing the fields: Date of happening, Title, Indoors?, Recurring? and Description. Except for Description, they all are mandatory (this is shown by the * signs).

section.p: While a namespace is selected, click on a documenttype name in the list at middle right.
